& Gresser, LLP

Appearance for (party/designation): Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell

Name: Christian R. Everdell, Esq.
Firm: Cohen & Gresser, LLP.
Address: 800 Third Avenue New York, NY 10022
Telephone: 212 - 957 - 7600 Fax: 212-957-4514

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case USA v. MAXWELL. It is an Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance form, completed by Christian R. Everdell, Esq. of Cohen & Gresser, LLP, representing Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell. The form confirms the correctness of the caption, appellate designation, and contact information. It also indicates that the case has been before this Court previously (USA v. Maxwell 20-3061).
